News.headline: Post Match Interview: John Still On The Aldershot Game
News.page_title: Post Match Interview: John Still On The Aldershot Game
News.URL_keywords: Post Match Interview: John Still On The Aldershot Game
News.short_description: Manager John Still gives his thoughts on the win against Aldershot Town on Tuesday night.
News.description:
"We knew that yesterday was going to be a tough game, but we created quite a few chances and I think that we should have scored from some of those chances and I think that we just deserved to win the game."

"We have scored a lot of goals so far this season, but you are going to have spells where maybe things don’t go your way, but we will keep doing what we do and keep playing the way that we play and we found a way to get the goal we needed yesterday."

"Corey Whitely has started to find the net more regularly and Hawkins’ work rate is phenomenal he does an unbelievable job for the team, he done great for the goal that we scored as well and I believe that he is developing into an incredible player."

"Justham made a very good save at the end of the game as well to keep the clean sheet and these are tough games, and to take four points out of Macclesfield and Aldershot I am not disappointed with that."

"All round it was a really good disciplined performance - we didn’t concede, we managed to get ourselves a goal and it is a good time to be a Dagenham supporter and the Dagenham manager at the minute."
